meanings.definition: A type of aircraft engine that uses a fan to generate thrust.
meanings.sent1: The fanjets on the airplane helped it fly smoothly through the sky.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic inspected the fanjets to ensure they were functioning properly.
meanings.sent3: The pilot joked that the fanjets were the real heroes of the flight.
meanings.sent4: The fanjets roared to life, propelling the aircraft forward with great force.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the fanjets made the plane look futuristic and powerful.

meanings.definition: A person who is enthusiastic about a particular sports team or performer.
meanings.sent1: As a fanjets of the local team, she never missed a game.
meanings.sent2: The fanjets cheered loudly for their favorite singer at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The young fanjets proudly wore their team's colors to show support.
meanings.sent4: She was a true fanjets, always defending her team against critics.
meanings.sent5: The fanjets' passion for the performer was contagious, spreading to everyone around.
